Directed by Stephen Hopkins.

Written by Virginie Brac. Virginie Brac. Virginie Brac. Virginie Brac. Oliver Butcher. Oliver Butcher.

Cast Vincent Cassel (Gabriel Delage). Eva Green (Alison Rowdy). LaÃ«titia EÃ¯do (Sabine Louseau). Aziz Dyab (Samir). Lyna Dubarry (Myriam). Olivia Popica (DCI Hobbs). Peter Mullan (Richard Banks). GÃ©rard Lanvin (Dumas). IrÃ¨ne Jacob (Sophie Saint-Roch). Stanislas Merhar (Didier Taraud). Patrick Kennedy (Mark Bolton). Eriq Ebouaney (Bob Foret). Bukky Bakray (Kim). Naomi Yang (Shahina). Christopher Sciueref (The Driver). Leonardo Taiwo (Toby Gleason). Cris Haris (CT-SFO Police). Thierry FrÃ©mont (French President). Marco Horanieh (Walid). David Avery (Charlie Drummond). Madi Belem (Krimo). Sacha Petronijevic (Vlado). Jim Sturgeon (Alex Reynolds (CTC Boss)). Nikolai Kinski (Vandermeer). Michael Amariah (Police Officer). Connor Mills (Police Officer 2).

Languages English. French.

Producers Edward Barlow. Thomas Bassett. Joanie Blaikie. Rupert Bray. Vincent Cassel. Jean-BenoÃ®t Gillig. Stephen Hopkins. Eric Jollant. Daniel Kilroy. Sarada McDermott. Gub Neal. Justin Thomson.

Production Apple Studios. Léonis Productions. Ringside Studios.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 6

Status OnGoing (2023–)
